title: Quick COVID-19 Severity Index (qCSI)
desc: The Quick COVID-19 Severity Index (qCSI) predicts 24 hr risk of critical respiratory illness in hospitalized COVID-19 patients.

orgreference.text: Haimovich A, Ravindra NG, Stoytchev S, et al. Development and validation of the quick COVID-19 severity index (qCSI): a prognostic tool for early clinical decompensation. Annals of Emergency Medicine. 2020.
